bk.GetAcList: select f.alarm_time,v.name,l.name,t.towername,f.alarm_level,f.alarm_position,f.distence,f.longitude,f.latitude,'','',f.alarm_status,f.alarm_line,t.tower_id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_com_mountain_h_firealarm_{0} f join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b l on f.alarm_line=l.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower t on l.id=t.line_id and f.alarm_tower=t.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype v on l.voltage_type=v.code WHERE f.alarm_time>={1} and f.alarm_time<{2}
bk.GetDcList: select f.alarm_time,v.name,l.name,t.towername,f.alarm_level,f.alarm_position,f.distence,f.longitude,f.latitude,'','',f.alarm_status,f.alarm_line,t.tower_id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_com_mountain_h_firealarm_{0} f join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b l on f.alarm_line=l.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower t on l.id=t.line_id and f.alarm_tower=t.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype v on l.voltage_type=v.code WHERE f.alarm_time>={1} and f.alarm_time<{2}
bk.GetAllDays: select distinct substr(to_char(alarm_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),0,10) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_com_mountain_h_firealarm_{0}
bk.GetLightCountC: select city_owner,city,count(1) c from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_fire where province_owner={2} and alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} group by city_owner,city order by c desc
bk.GetLightCountD: select district_owner,district,count(1) c from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_fire where city_owner={2} and alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} group by district_owner,district order by c desc
bk.GetLightPTime: SELECT alarm_time,longitude,latitude,1 as alarm_level FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_fire where province_owner={2} and alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} order by alarm_time
bk.GetLightCTime: SELECT alarm_time,longitude,latitude,1 as alarm_level FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_fire where city_owner={2} and alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} order by alarm_time
bk.GetLightDTime: SELECT alarm_time,longitude,latitude,1 as alarm_level FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_fire where district_owner={2} and alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} order by alarm_time

ROOT.GetLineStat: SELECT alarm_line,0,0,sum(fire_time) as fire_time from ( SELECT alarm_line,0,0,count(distinct alarm_time) as fire_time from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREALARM_2022 where alarm_line is not null and length(alarm_line)>0 and alarm_time<{1} AND alarm_time>={0} group by alarm_line UNION ALL SELECT DCLOUD_ID,0,0,count(distinct MONITORTIME) as fire_time from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_WILDFIRE_HN_INFO where DCLOUD_ID is not null and length(DCLOUD_ID)>0 and MONITORTIME<{1} AND MONITORTIME>={0} group by DCLOUD_ID UNION ALL SELECT alarm_line,0,0,count(1) as fire_time from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREFORECAST_2022 where alarm_line is not null and length(alarm_line)>0 and alarm_time<{1} AND alarm_time>={0} AND alarm_time>=sysdate group by alarm_line UNION ALL SELECT DCLOUD_ID,0,0,COUNT(1) from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_WILDFIRE_INFO where DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL and length(DCLOUD_ID)>0 and FUTURETIME<{1} AND FUTURETIME>={0} AND FUTURETIME>=sysdate group by DCLOUD_ID ) t group by alarm_line
ROOT.SkipRegion: AND (REGION LIKE '天津%' OR REGION LIKE '北京%' OR REGION LIKE '河北%' OR REGION LIKE '山西%' OR REGION LIKE '冀北%' OR REGION LIKE '山东%' OR REGION LIKE '蒙西%' OR REGION LIKE '内蒙古%')
ROOT.SkipProvince: AND (PROVINCE LIKE '天津%' OR PROVINCE LIKE '北京%' OR PROVINCE LIKE '河北%' OR PROVINCE LIKE '山西%' OR PROVINCE LIKE '冀北%' OR PROVINCE LIKE '山东%' OR PROVINCE LIKE '蒙西%' OR PROVINCE LIKE '内蒙古%')
ROOT.ChangeRegion: CASE WHEN REGION LIKE '内蒙古%' THEN '蒙西' ELSE SUBSTR(REGION,0,2) END AS REGION
ROOT.ChangePROVINCE: CASE WHEN PROVINCE LIKE '内蒙古%' THEN '蒙西' ELSE SUBSTR(PROVINCE,0,2) END AS REGION
ROOT.GetLightCountP: select region,region,count(1) c FROM ( SELECT same:ChangeRegion FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT REGION,ALARM_TIME,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREALARM_2022 where alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} same:SkipRegion ) A union all SELECT same:ChangeRegion FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PROVINCE AS REGION,MONITORTIME,LON,LAT from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_WILDFIRE_HN_INFO where MONITORTIME>={0} and MONITORTIME<{1} same:SkipProvince ) A1 UNION ALL SELECT same:ChangeRegion from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREFORECAST_2022 where alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} and alarm_time>=sysdate same:SkipRegion UNION ALL SELECT same:ChangePROVINCE from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_WILDFIRE_INFO where FUTURETIME>={0} and FUTURETIME<{1} and FUTURETIME>=sysdate same:SkipProvince ) a group by region order by c desc
ROOT.GetLightAllTime: SELECT distinct alarm_time,longitude,latitude,1 ,region FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREALARM_2022 where alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT MONITORTIME,lon,lat,1 ,province FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_WILDFIRE_HN_INFO where MONITORTIME>={0} and MONITORTIME<{1} UNION ALL SELECT alarm_time,longitude,latitude,1 ,region FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREFORECAST_2022 where alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} AND alarm_time>=sysdate UNION ALL SELECT FUTURETIME,LON,LAT,1 ,PROVINCE FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_WILDFIRE_INFO where FUTURETIME>={0} and FUTURETIME<{1} AND FUTURETIME>=sysdate order by alarm_time
ROOT.GetLineTower: select alarm_tower,alarm_tower,alarm_time,longitude,latitude,distence,region from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREALARM_2022 where alarm_line={0} AND alarm_time>={1} and alarm_time<{2} UNION ALL select POLEID,POLEID,MONITORTIME,LON,LAT,DISTANCE,PROVINCE from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_WILDFIRE_HN_INFO where DCLOUD_ID={0} AND MONITORTIME>={1} and MONITORTIME<{2} UNION ALL select alarm_tower,alarm_tower,alarm_time,longitude,latitude,distence,region from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREFORECAST_2022 where alarm_line={0} AND alarm_time>={1} and alarm_time<{2} AND alarm_time>=sysdate UNION ALL select POLEID,POLEID,FUTURETIME,LON,LAT,VALUE,PROVINCE from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_WILDFIRE_INFO where DCLOUD_ID={0} AND FUTURETIME>={1} and FUTURETIME<{2} AND FUTURETIME>=sysdate
ROOT.GetLineWarn: select alarm_time,max(insert_time),max(alarm_level)||'','' from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREALARM_2022 WHERE alarm_line={0} AND alarm_time>={1} AND alarm_time<{2} group by alarm_time UNION ALL select MONITORTIME,MONITORTIME,ALARMLEVID||'','' from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_WILDFIRE_HN_INFO WHERE DCLOUD_ID={0} AND MONITORTIME>={1} AND MONITORTIME<{2} UNION ALL select alarm_time,alarm_time,alarm_level||'','' from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREFORECAST_2022 WHERE alarm_line={0} AND alarm_time>={1} AND alarm_time<{2} AND alarm_time>=sysdate UNION ALL select FUTURETIME,FUTURETIME,'','' from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_WILDFIRE_INFO WHERE DCLOUD_ID={0} AND FUTURETIME>={1} AND FUTURETIME<{2} AND FUTURETIME>=sysdate ORDER BY alarm_time DESC
